mapper.sql: id, creator, createDate, lastModifier, lastModDate, status, priority, modelId, assignUrl, whereSql, name
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO mubs_data_model ( id, creator, createDate, lastModifier, lastModDate, status, priority, modelId, assignUrl, whereSql, name ) VALUES ( #{id}, #{creator}, #{createDate}, #{lastModifier}, #{lastModDate}, #{status}, #{priority}, #{modelId}, #{assignUrl}, #{whereSql}, #{name} )
mapper.update:
UPDATE mubs_data_model
creator = #{creator},
createDate = #{createDate},
lastModifier = #{lastModifier},
lastModDate = #{lastModDate},
status = #{status},
priority = #{priority},
modelId = #{modelId},
assignUrl = #{assignUrl},
whereSql = #{whereSql},
name = #{name},
WHERE id = #{id}

UPDATE mubs_data_model
creator = #{map.creator},
createDate = #{map.createDate},
lastModifier = #{map.lastModifier},
lastModDate = #{map.lastModDate},
status = #{map.status},
priority = #{map.priority},
modelId = #{map.modelId},
assignUrl = #{map.assignUrl},
whereSql = #{map.whereSql},
name = #{map.name},
WHERE id = #{map.id}
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO mubs_data_model ( id, creator, createDate, lastModifier, lastModDate, status, priority, modelId, assignUrl, whereSql, name ) VALUES ( #{map.id}, #{map.creator}, #{map.createDate}, #{map.lastModifier}, #{map.lastModDate}, #{map.status}, #{map.priority}, #{map.modelId}, #{map.assignUrl}, #{map.whereSql}, #{map.name} )
mapper.select:
SELECT
FROM mubs_data_model
and id in (#{condition.whereSql})
limit ${offset}, ${rows}

SELECT
FROM mubs_data_model
AND id like '%#{id}%'
AND creator like '%#{creator}%'
AND createDate like '%#{createDate}%'
AND lastModifier like '%#{lastModifier}%'
AND lastModDate like '%#{lastModDate}%'
AND status like '%#{status}%'
AND priority like '%#{priority}%'
AND modelId like '%#{modelId}%'
AND assignUrl like '%#{assignUrl}%'
AND whereSql like '%#{whereSql}%'
AND name like '%#{name}%'
